entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023
